title: Large Language Models for Information Retrieval: A Survey

sections.description: Introduce the topic of large language models (LLMs) and their significance in information retrieval. Discuss the purpose and scope of the survey, highlighting the focus on transformer-based models and their role in enhancing semantic search capabilities.
